DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate use Digoxin immune fab addition expectant management treatment severe preeclampsia compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Study Efficacy Safety DigiFab® Antepartum Subjects With Severe Preeclampsia
DOC.criteria: Fetal gestational age 23 0/7 31 6/7 week Treated expectant management Meets ACOG criterion severe preeclampsia Willing able provide write , informed consent Decision deliver within 24 hour make Weight > 150 kg Eclampsia Significant antecedent obstetrical problem Clinically significant fetal anomaly chromosomal abnormality Chronic renal disease Active hepatic disease , antiphospholipid antibody syndrome , lupus Unstable medical psychiatric disorder Need use digitalis like product History anaphylactic allergic reaction Prior use antibodies/fab fragment sheep Serum creatinine ≥ 2.0 mg/dL Platelet count < 50,000 Pulmonary edema Estimated fetal weight < 5th percentile
